body:
Hey everyone, I've decided to run an unofficial tournament seen as the official tourney won't be happening for a while. Nova's tourney will finish next week so mine will be the following weekend. I'm making this post in advance though.


Hosts - Spoookeh & Lgmatias
Refs - nintendoboy11, DaFrozenBlaze
Streamers - Bloodoh

 New maps: Stage 1- Rendezvous New CTW / Senex Scrim / ActrixTE
                       Stage 2 - WahizCTW / Babylon Gardens / SupplyTDM
                       Stage 3 - Rendezvous 3.5TE / RenTdezvous CW / Injustice

The matches will be played on Avicus scrim servers.


System - Single Elimination, BO3

Gamemodes - CTW, DTM & TDM
 
Roster Sizes - 6-8 players; all must be on the forum team

Streamers & Refs - I'm looking for streamers and refs, add me on skype: spooks_99001

Time Limit - 45 minutes (TDM differs) 

Sign Up (Leaders only please) - http://goo.gl/forms/BOEqVYtpcO

Challonge - http://challonge.com/Avicusrogue

Dates and Times

Saturday 5th March - Sign Up Opens
Thursday 17th March - Sign Up Closes

Saturday 19th March - First Matches

The matches will be played on Saturday 19th March and Sunday 20th March. 

Matches 1,2,3 and 4 will be played at 4pm GMT (Saturday).

The semi-finals and final will follow, possibly ending up on Sunday. If this happens they will start at 4pm GMT.

replies.body:
So basically, trying to fit 2 groups with 3-4 different time zones into 1 or 2 days (12 matches in total) is really damn hard. I've changed it to single elimination just because it will be easier to host with the limited people I have helping me. 

The new system will be single elimination, BO3 in all rounds. 

New bracket: http://challonge.com/Avicusrogue

New maps: Stage 1- Rendezvous New CTW / Senex Scrim / ActrixTE
                       Stage 2 - WahizCTW / Babylon Gardens / SupplyTDM
                       Stage 3 - Rendezvous 3.5TE / Senex CTW / Injustice

The matches will be played on Saturday 19th March and Sunday 20th March.
Matches 1,2,3 and 4 will be played at 4pm GMT (Saturday), the semi-finals and final will follow, possibly ending up on Sunday.

I'm sure a weeks notice is enough, glhf and see you in the tourney!
replies.body_tagged:

replies.body:
Congrats China Baby Toes for beating Apollo in the final, really great matches!

It was quite stressful organising, and wasn't as smooth as I would have wanted it to go due to teams no showing and such. However, the matches that were played were great.

Thanks everyone for participating, especially Cacal who stayed up until 4am to play in the semi-final.

Also thank you Javi for sorting out the scrim servers this morning.

Until next time, ggwp everyone.
